duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct cost estimating for client projects and internal bids, evaluating bid specifications and drawings to ensure successful bidding and project win.
Work with project management teams to follow up on bids and budgets to close the business.
Prepare cost estimates using plans at varying levels, takeoff spreadsheets, and engineering reports.
Utilize e4Clicks software to support cost estimates for specific clients.
Communicate effectively and work with multiple online tools such as SharePoint, Teams, Asana, and Zoom.

education_certification.credential: CCEA®, PCEA®, or American Society of Professional Estimators certification
